mapper.select: select distinct flightTime,kind,bookingNum,resDate,depfnum,arrfnum,depAirportNm,arrAirportNm from bookingTicket join flightData on bookingTicket.depFnum = flightData.fnum where id=#{id} order by resDate desc;

select bnum,fnum,bookingNum,kind,flightBNum,name,id,depAirportNm,vihicleId,arrAirportNm,depPlandTime,arrPlandTime from flightData join bookingTicket on bookingTicket.depFnum = flightData.fnum where bookingNum = #{bookingNum};

select distinct bookingNum, mileagePlus, mileageMin, resDate as couName from (select distinct Q.resDate, Z.* from (select distinct A.bookingNum, B.mileagePlus, C.mileageMin, A.bnum from (select bookingNum, bnum from bookingPrice where id=#{id} order by bnum desc) A left outer join (select bookingNum, sum(mileagePlus) mileagePlus from bookingPrice where id=#{id} group by bookingNum) B on A.bookingNum = B.bookingNum left outer join (select distinct bookingNum, ifnull(mileageMin,0) mileageMin from bookingPrice where id=#{id}) C on B.bookingNum = C.bookingNum) Z left outer join bookingTicket Q on Z.bookingNum = Q.bookingNum order by Z.bnum desc) F;

select distinct bookingNum, mileagePlus, mileageMin, resDate as couName from (select distinct Q.resDate, Z.* from (select distinct A.bookingNum, B.mileagePlus, C.mileageMin, A.bnum from (select bookingNum, bnum from bookingPrice where id=#{id} order by bnum desc) A left outer join (select bookingNum, sum(mileagePlus) mileagePlus from bookingPrice where id=#{id} group by bookingNum) B on A.bookingNum = B.bookingNum left outer join (select distinct bookingNum, ifnull(mileageMin,0) mileageMin from bookingPrice where id=#{id}) C on B.bookingNum = C.bookingNum) Z left outer join bookingTicket Q on Z.bookingNum = Q.bookingNum order by Z.bnum desc) F limit 6;
